scripts.deploy files to Raspberry: lftp -e "set sftp:auto-confirm yes; set sftp:connect-program 'ssh'; open sftp://pi:p0sspi@192.168.1.16:22; cd Projects/school-notif; put ./index.js; put ./package.json; cd web; put ./web/index.html; bye;"
scripts.ssh to Raspberry: echo ========= & echo "Project path : [cd Projects/school-notif]" & echo "To update package : [npm install --only=production]" & echo "Kill process : [ps aux | grep index] and [sudo kill xx]" & echo ========== & ssh pi@192.168.1.16
